ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a Brexit deal on 29 March, there will be changes that affect your food and drink business. Find out how you can prepare.
ordered_related_items.title: The food and drink sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU there may be changes to how UK organisations, such as charities, businesses and universities are funded.
ordered_related_items.title: European and domestic funding after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU there may be changes to the requirements for placing certain products on the UK and EU markets.
ordered_related_items.title: Regulations and standards after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: Parts of UK intellectual property (IP) law will change when the UK leaves the EU.
ordered_related_items.title: Intellectual property after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, and you are a company that makes, supplies or uses chemicals, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The chemicals sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: Oil and gas production and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The aerospace sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The construction sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The automotive sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU, the way businesses both offer services in the EU and operate will change.
ordered_related_items.title: Operating in the EU after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU, there may be changes to how you sell goods or services to the UK public sector.
ordered_related_items.title: Public sector procurement after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The retail sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: Gas markets and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU there may be changes to the rules governing the use of personal data.
ordered_related_items.title: Using personal data after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU there may be changes to areas including energy renewables, the nuclear industry and regulated carbon emissions.
ordered_related_items.title: Energy and climate after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: When the UK leaves the EU there may be changes to UK-EU trade at the UK border including on customs, tariffs, VAT, safety and security, documentation, vehicle standards, and controlled products.
ordered_related_items.title: Importing, exporting and transporting products or goods after Brexit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The professional and business services sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU on 29 March without a Brexit deal, there may be changes that affect your arable, livestock or horticulture farming business.
ordered_related_items.title: The farming sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The electronics, machinery and parts sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.title: The space sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.title: The consumer goods sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU without a deal, there may be changes that affect your business.
ordered_related_items.title: The life sciences sector and preparing for EU Exit

ordered_related_items.description: UK position on reciprocity of rights for airlines from EU countries, and the basis on which flights will continue in the event of no deal.
ordered_related_items.title: Air services from the EU to the UK in the event of no deal

ordered_related_items.description: If the UK leaves the EU on 29 March without a deal, there may be changes that affect private, official or abattoir veterinarians.

available_translations.title: Find EU Exit guidance for your business
available_translations.description: This is the information that has been published so far for your business to prepare for EU exit. You can change what information you get using the checkboxes. Come back to this page regularly or sign up to receive emails when new information is published.

description: This is the information that has been published so far for your business to prepare for EU exit. You can change what information you get using the checkboxes. Come back to this page regularly or sign up to receive emails when new information is published.
